block.comment: Gets all the locations set up? Spawns structures, some more stuff and gamerules
Gets all the beds and defenders/beacons set up
You'll turn into a spectator once your bed has been destroyed or when you die.
Every time the user clicks, something happens... or something
Set gameId so we know that null is not associated with any player
If the player moves the code does something
Join server sets gameId to 0 so this should never occur. Code is here for debugging only.

block.field: "This should not happen for a player: " + player.name
team + " team has lost a player"
"Your bed has been destroyed, You are now a spectator"
"Sorry you are not wearing the elytra"
"Sorry, arrows or snowballs need to be in your offhand to launch "
"Sorry you cannot fly, your elytra is damaged. You are now infantry"
